name: La Digue Passage: White Birds on Wind
scene: 6 terns, 1 buoy, 3 beacons. Blink rate spells a number.
riddle: A thought repeated becomes a path.

renderSpec.prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card of 6 terns, 1 buoy, 3 beacons. Blink rate spells a number.. channel_passage_navigation_rhythm with wind_swept_feather_beacon_light_texture. Cultural stamps: tern_flight_patterns, maritime_navigation. Volumetric depth, painterly effects, living busy scene. Etched-map caption strip with gold title. 17th-century nautical chart + Seychellois modernist painting, ritualistic archaeological mood.
